# Online course book, ERHS 535 {-}

This is the online book for Colorado State University's ERHS 535 *R Programming for Research* course. This book includes course information, course notes, links to download pdfs of lecture slides, in-course exercises, homework assignments, and vocabulary lists for quizzes for this course. 

> "“Give someone a program, you frustrate them for a day; teach them how to program, you frustrate them for a lifetime.”---David Leinweber"
